docs.snippet: A 125-year-old mystery surrounding the scorer of the world's first league goal has ended with the publication of a new book identifying James Kenyon "Kenny" Davenport of Bolton Wanderers as the man....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 125-year-old mystery surrounding the scorer of the world's first league goal has ended with the publication of a new book identifying James Kenyon "Kenny" Davenport of Bolton Wanderers as the man.

headline.main: Scorer of First League Goal Identified After 125 Years

docs.snippet: Former Ohio State University president Gordon Gee, who retired under a cloud after remarks jabbing Roman Catholics and Southeastern Conference schools, will receive a $5.8 million package over the next five years, along with an office, a secretary...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Ohio State University president Gordon Gee, who retired under a cloud after remarks jabbing Roman Catholics and Southeastern Conference schools, will receive a $5.8 million package over the next five years, along with an office, a secretary and a premium parking pass, the university said Monday.

headline.main: Ohio St Reaches $5.8M Deal With Retired President
headline.print_headline: Ohio St Reaches $5.8M Deal With Retired President

docs.snippet: The comedian Terry Fator brought his genial, unusual ventriloquist act to the New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark....
docs.lead_paragraph: The comedian Terry Fator brought his genial, unusual ventriloquist act to the New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark.
docs.abstract: Neil Genzlinger looks at highlights from comedian Terry Fator's ventriloquist act at New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark; asserts that Fator's popularity is due to his genial and unusual act, which emanates gratitude and good will.

headline.seo: Terry Fator’s Comic Style Successfully Plays to the Middle
headline.main: A Genial Comedian With Chatty Sidekicks and PG Patter
headline.print_headline: A Genial Comedian With Chatty Sidekicks and PG Patter

docs.snippet: Longtime Penn State head coach Joe Paterno said that the university mishandled its response to the Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse scandal, a former assistant coach testified Monday during a hearing for three top school officials accused of a cover...
docs.lead_paragraph: Longtime Penn State head coach Joe Paterno said that the university mishandled its response to the Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse scandal, a former assistant coach testified Monday during a hearing for three top school officials accused of a cover-up.

headline.main: Witness: Paterno Said Penn St. Erred on Sandusky
headline.print_headline: Witness: Paterno Said Penn St. Erred on Sandusky

docs.snippet: Baltusrol has made its bid to be designated a National Historic Landmark. The course has showcased the work of the architect A. W. Tillinghast for more than a century....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baltusrol has made its bid to be designated a National Historic Landmark. The course has showcased the work of the architect A. W. Tillinghast for more than a century.
docs.abstract: Lisa D Mickey On Par column notes that Baltusrol, private 36-hole golf club in Springfield, NJ, that hosted the 2005 PGA Championship, has made its bid to be designated a National Historic Landmark, distinction held by only three golf courses in United States; Baltusrol has showcased work of architect A W Tillinghast for more than a century.

headline.main: Baltusrol Is a Landmark Course in Almost Every Sense
headline.print_headline: Landmark Course In Almost Every Sense
